text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product specifications and product name information.

Product name:
Asmyna SAMI777HPCDM005NP Dazzling Diamond Diamante Case for SAMSUNG: I777 (Galaxy S II) - 1 Pack - Retail Packaging - Phoenix Tail

Product specifications:
Add some bling to your ring with beautiful rhinestone crystals along with extra protection from scratches, bumps, dirt, grease and fingerprints
Showcase your own personal style while maintaining the out of the box freshness for your device
Phoenix Tail design in a durable style with a slim and compact form
Easy installation - just press on your phone without any tools
Designed for your SAMSUNG: I777 (Galaxy S II)
Durable slim fit hard plastic snap-on case
Accurate cutouts provide full access to all the functions of your phone including all ports, charging jack and screen

Product description:
text.Response A: Bring home the action of the WWE with a WWE Basic Braun Strowman Figure! Recreate your favorite matches with an approximately 6-inch figure in "Superstar scale." Pose him to spar in a menacing stance, pair him with another figure to battle or create total mayhem by adding multiple figures (each sold separately, subject to availability). Features articulation, amazing accuracy and authentic Superstar details like armbands and tatoos. Let the WWE mayhem begin! Colors and decorations may vary.
text.Response B: The Phoenix Tail Dazzling Diamond Case by Asmyna for your SAMSUNG: I777 (Galaxy S II) is a durable slim fit snap-on case made to add luxury, style and protection to your phone. The case is constructed of durable hard plastic adorned with beautiful rhinestone crystals to give it a unique, one-of-a-kind design and protection to match. The Phoenix Tail Dazzling Diamond design really gives the cover brilliance and shine, complementing the look and feel of your SAMSUNG: I777 (Galaxy S II) . , while a hard plastic construction provides protection from scratches, dents and other types of damage. Showcase your personal style and protect your investment today!

227.displayed_text:
Prompt

You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product specifications and product name information.

Product name:
Asmyna SAMI777HPCDM005NP Dazzling Diamond Diamante Case for SAMSUNG: I777 (Galaxy S II) - 1 Pack - Retail Packaging - Phoenix Tail

Product specifications:
Add some bling to your ring with beautiful rhinestone crystals along with extra protection from scratches, bumps, dirt, grease and fingerprints
Showcase your own personal style while maintaining the out of the box freshness for your device
Phoenix Tail design in a durable style with a slim and compact form
Easy installation - just press on your phone without any tools
Designed for your SAMSUNG: I777 (Galaxy S II)
Durable slim fit hard plastic snap-on case
Accurate cutouts provide full access to all the functions of your phone including all ports, charging jack and screen

Product description:

Response A

Bring home the action of the WWE with a WWE Basic Braun Strowman Figure! Recreate your favorite matches with an approximately 6-inch figure in "Superstar scale." Pose him to spar in a menacing stance, pair him with another figure to battle or create total mayhem by adding multiple figures (each sold separately, subject to availability). Features articulation, amazing accuracy and authentic Superstar details like armbands and tatoos. Let the WWE mayhem begin! Colors and decorations may vary.

Response B

The Phoenix Tail Dazzling Diamond Case by Asmyna for your SAMSUNG: I777 (Galaxy S II) is a durable slim fit snap-on case made to add luxury, style and protection to your phone. The case is constructed of durable hard plastic adorned with beautiful rhinestone crystals to give it a unique, one-of-a-kind design and protection to match. The Phoenix Tail Dazzling Diamond design really gives the cover brilliance and shine, complementing the look and feel of your SAMSUNG: I777 (Galaxy S II) . , while a hard plastic construction provides protection from scratches, dents and other types of damage. Showcase your personal style and protect your investment today!
